column4: Mariko[Linux] ,  I'm wondering if it's an issue with the laptop's onboard sound ... don't know if that's likely or not, nor what to suggest
Hm ... not *me* maybe ... I'm not good with sound issues, and haven't really noticed who is, but I know that several people are. ... Who's good with soundcard / alsamixer issues here?
is something blocking your sound device as well?
no, not mine ... but I'm going to have to go; I was trying to think who to point Mariko[Linux]   to
